thread.title: ATEC Wireless Unveils DASCAD Tool, a Revolution of DAS Design and Prediction
thread.title_full: ATEC Wireless Unveils DASCAD Tool, a Revolution of DAS Design and Prediction

author: admin
title: ATEC Wireless Unveils DASCAD Tool, a Revolution of DAS Design and Prediction
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Atec Wireless, LLC 
PARSIPPANY, N.J. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Atec Wireless, LLC, announced today the launch of the beta version of DASCAD@ [ www.dascad.com ], a flagship In-Building design solution of Atec Group. DASCAD will provide wireless professionals the tools to carry out In-Building wireless networks design, budgeting, coverage prediction and project management. The new solution will also offer the necessary hardware required to perform coverage studies and network benchmark. 
DASCAD@ [ www.dascad.com ] is an innovative solution created to address the increasing demand for indoor coverage reliability and capacity which requires innovative testing and design techniques. DASCAD supports GSM / EDGE / GPRS / WCDMA / HSUPA / CDMA / EVDO / HSPA/ LTE and other wireless technologies. 
Ahmed Abogendia, founder and CEO, quoted “DASCAD will revolutionize the In-Building wireless industry and we are very excited to be part of it.” 
About Atec Wireless, LLC: A leader in the wireless network design, deployment and optimization. For over a decade, Atec Wireless has assisted leading Telecom Operators and OEMs like AT&T, Ericsson, Huawei, Sprint, Verizon and Vodafone to build and maintain their networks globally. www.atecwireless.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150916005361/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
